===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# Sentence final particle indicating uncertainty in a statement; implies that the speaker is not sure where what he/she says is true.
#: {{zh-x|我 返 屋企 食 麵。|I'm going to go home and eat noodles.|C}}
#: {{zh-x|我 返 屋企 食 麵 啩。|'''Well''', I'm '''probably''' going to go home and eat noodles.|C}}
